parameters.name: Direction
parameters.description:
The order in which the returned entries are sorted. Valid values:

*   DESC (default): descending order
*   ASC: ascending order

parameters.name: DomainType
parameters.description:
The type of the domain name. The parameter value is not case-sensitive. Valid values:

*   PUBLIC (default): hosted public domain name
*   CACHE: cache-accelerated domain name

parameters.name: EndDate
parameters.description: The end date of the time range to be queried. Specify the time in the yyyy-MM-dd format, such as 2023-03-13.

parameters.name: Keyword
parameters.description: The keyword. Keyword is used together with SearchMode.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description: The language. Valid values: zh, en, and ja.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Pages start from page 1. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Valid values: 1 to 1000.

parameters.name: SearchMode
parameters.description:
The search mode of the keyword. Valid values:

*   LIKE (default): fuzzy search
*   EXACT: exact search

parameters.name: StartDate
parameters.description: The start date of the time range to be queried. Specify the time in the yyyy-MM-dd format, such as 2023-03-01.

parameters.name: Threshold
parameters.description:
The threshold for the number of Domain Name System (DNS) requests. You can query the subdomain names at the specified quantity level of DNS requests and query the number of DNS requests for each subdomain name.

If you do not specify this parameter, the data about the subdomain names that have DNS requests is obtained.

If you set this parameter to a value less than 0, the data about all subdomain names is obtained.

If you set this parameter to 0, the data about the subdomain names that do not have DNS requests is obtained.

If you set this parameter to a value greater than 0, the data about the subdomain names whose number of DNS requests is less than or equal to the value of this parameter is obtained.
